text: More seriously, I'd rather add missing parts to the manual than add links to blog posts.

elements.text: More seriously, I'd rather add missing parts to the manual than add links to blog posts.

text:
It is much easier to write a blog post (probably polluted with nasty language mistakes) than pass DataFrames.jl PR merging gatekeeper (read: <@U67431ELR>).

More seriously: the problem is that we have a dual purpose of DataFrames.jl documentation:
1. providing specification of things;
2. being a manual (i.e. explaining motivations and showing how things should be done).

We would have to think how to best combine both. If someone has a good recipe for this then some hints would be welcome (it would be great to re-work the manual before 1.0 release).
